rules.name: specification
rules: The traceability link should be related to a variable in the B program.

rules.name: events
rules: The traceability link should be related to an event in the log.

rules.name: events2
rules: The traceability link should be related to another event in the log.

rules.name: designComponent
rules: The name of the trace in the log should start with the sensor specified in the traceability link, and it should correspond to a component in the UML model.
